sections.heading: "Witness" as used in this Act shall include a person whose
sections.text:
testimony is desired in any proceeding or investigation by a grand jury or
in a criminal action, prosecution or proceeding.

sections.heading: Summoning
sections.text: witness in this state to testify in another state.

sections.heading: Witness
sections.text: from another state summoned to testify in this State.

sections.heading: Exemption
sections.text: from arrest and service of process.

sections.heading: Short title.
sections.text:
This Act may be cited as the Uniform Act to Secure
the Attendance of Witnesses from Within or Without a State in Criminal
Proceedings.
